description:
Yamato Rinko is a girl whom http://anidb.net/ch72035 [Takeo] saves from a molester on a train. She attends Koizumi Girls` Academy, and is very skilled in making sweets. She has a crush on Takeo who, on the other hand, thinks that she likes http://anidb.net/ch72037 [Sunakawa]. However, once they clear up the misunderstanding thanks to Suna they begin going out.
Source: Ore Monogatari Wikia
name: Yamato Rinko
